name: Cry of Silence
description:
Halloween series composed of three artworks, "Lady of the Night", "Voices from Beyond" and "Cry of Silence".

Cry of Silence

"The lady of the night reflected the reflection of the voices from beyond
It was then that silence screamed and screamed right at the tip of her ear
In the corner of the ear everything is heard, in the corner of the ear death whispers.

For a few minutes all that could be seen was darkness
For a few minutes nothing was heard
For a few seconds the silence whispered
For a few seconds the silence screamed
But who could hear?
For a few seconds you heard nothing".
